verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Ee Mungu Mungu wangu (moyo)
Moyo wangu u thabiti (thabiti)
Nitaimba nitai-imba nitaimba zaburi
Nitaimba mimi nitaimba
nitaimba zaburi).

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Mimi nitai-imba, nitaimba zaburi
(Amka kinanda ewe kinanda -
amka ewe kinanda
Amka kinubi ewe kinubi -
amka ewe kinubi
Nitaamka alfaji-ri
nitamuimbia Bwana.) x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu nitakushukuru
kati ya watu.
Nitakuimbia zaburi
kati ya mataifa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kwa maana fadhili zako
ni za milele.
Na uaminifu wako hata
juu mawinguni.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu utukuzwe juu
ya mbingu yote.
Na juu ya nchi yote uwe
utukufu wako.
